data.name: Teravit
data.detailed_description:
The world consists of various climates and terrains with different characteristics, such as plains filled with colorful flowers, lava fields engulfed in flames, swamps that emit poisonous gases that make it hard to breathe, and wastelands with dead trees which cover the entire landscape. Each of these climates and terrains also contain different vegetation, animals, and uniquely developed cultures.



It was like a jewelery box filled with beautiful treasures and colors, until the sudden appearance of the Demon King and his servants arrived from a different dimension. Villages were destroyed, forts and castles were raised, and the world was slowly swallowed up by darkness. It was also at this time, that you would arrive in this world.



There is a variety of options to choose from, such as exploration, collecting equipments, mining and foraging, weapon and item crafting, base building, vehicle construction, treasure hunting, surveying the vegetation and animals in different biomes, and much more. Defeating the Demon King is not your only goal. Embark on an adventure suited for you, and create your own story in Teravit.

Main Features

  • Editable Avatar:

     Create your own avatar using MagicaVoxel and become the hero you wish to be.


    * Sample data was provided by courtesy of Alpha testers.

  • Randomly generated fantasy world:

     Set the world size, and the balance between the land and sea, to adventure in a world that is unique from all others.



  • Single & Multiplayer:

     Adventure alone, or host a server and adventure together with your friends.



  • Great variety of items and weapons:

     You can use weapons with different ranges and speeds, as well as bombs, molotov cocktails, and other items that can affect the terrain, to fight against monsters. Some of these weapons can be used for powerful special techniques.



  • Paraglide & Hookshot:

     The landscape is as described, full of mountains and valleys. Use a variety of methods to move around these tall places including paraglides for an exhilarating experience.

    Paraglide


    Hookshot


  • Vessels & Airships:

     Build vehicles that can conquer the sea and sky to easily travel around the vast world with your friends.



  • Forts, Castles & Demon Castles:

     There are many castles in the world that have been built by the monster leader and the Demon Lord himself, waiting for you to challenge them.



  • Build a base:

     Collect and craft blocks and decorations to build your base wherever you want, however you want.

data.short_description: Teravit is an open-world sandbox RPG with multiplayer support that allows you to freely explore and adventure in a vast and diverse fantasy voxel world.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Turkish*, Vietnamese*, Russian*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX730 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1080 or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
